name: logseq-reminder-plugin
description: Desktop and in-app notifications for scheduled blocks in Logseq
author: Logseq Community

leadTimeMinutes.title: Lead Time (minutes)
leadTimeMinutes.description: How many minutes before scheduled time to show notification

pollIntervalSeconds.title: Check Interval (seconds)
pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often to check for due reminders

enableAllDayReminders.title: Enable All-Day Block Reminders
enableAllDayReminders.description: Show reminders for blocks scheduled without specific times

allDayReminderHour.title: All-Day Reminder Hour (0-23)
allDayReminderHour.description: What hour to remind for all-day scheduled blocks (9 = 9 AM)
